Class DocumentsService

    • Method Detail

      • uploadDocument

        public com.mambu.docs.shared.model.Document uploadDocument(com.mambu.api.server.handler.documents.model.JSONDocument document)
                                                    throws MambuApiException
        Upload new Document using a JSONDocument object and as json request
        Parameters:
        document - the new document object to be uploaded containing all mandatory fields
        Returns:
        the new document parsed as an object returned from the API call
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • getDocument

        public java.lang.String getDocument(java.lang.String documentId)
                             throws MambuApiException
        Get base64 encoded document data by document id. A typical scenario would be getting a list of attachments for a client/group/account via getDocuments() API and then retrieving a specific document (attachment) by its id with this API call.
        Parameters:
        documentId - the encoded key or id of the document
        Returns:
        base64 encoded document content
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • deleteDocument

        public boolean deleteDocument(java.lang.String documentId)
                       throws MambuApiException
        Delete document by its Id
        Parameters:
        documentId - document id or encoded key
        Returns:
        status
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • getImage

        public java.lang.String getImage(java.lang.String imageKey,
                                 APIData.IMAGE_SIZE_TYPE sizeType)
                          throws MambuApiException
        Get an Image file using file's encoded key and the preferred image size
        Parameters:
        imageKey - a key to access image file (e.g. client's profile picture key: client.getProfilePictureKey())
        sizeType - a desired size to be returned. E.g LARGE, MEDIUM, SMALL_THUMB, TINY_THUMB. Can be null to get full size
        Returns:
        a base64 string with encoded image file
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • getDocuments

        public java.util.List<com.mambu.docs.shared.model.Document> getDocuments(MambuEntityType parentEntity,
                                                                         java.lang.String parentId,
                                                                         java.lang.Integer offset,
                                                                         java.lang.Integer limit)
                                                                  throws MambuApiException
        Get all Documents for a given parent entity
        Parameters:
        parentEntity - MambuEntityType for which documents are retrieved. Must not be null. Documents for the following entities are currently supported: Client, Group. LoanAccount, SavingsAccount, LoanProduct, SavingsProduct, Branch, Centre, User
        parentId - entity id or encoded key for the parent entity. Example, client id for a MambuEntityType.CLIENT. Must not be null
        offset - pagination offset
        limit - pagination limit
        Returns:
        a list of documents for the parent entity
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • getSupportedEntities

        public static MambuEntityType[] getSupportedEntities()
        Get supported entity types
        Returns:
        all supported entities

      • isSupported

        public static boolean isSupported(MambuEntityType parentEntityType)
        Is parent entity type supported by the API
        Parameters:
        parentEntityType - Mambu Entity type
        Returns:
        true if supported
